Secondary : To compare treatment-related toxic effect , failure-free survival , pattern failure . OUTLINE : This multicenter , randomize study . Patients stratify accord histology ( squamous cell v ) , number mediastinum lymph node , whether N2 disease diagnose operation . Arm I : Patients undergo 3D conform thoracic radiotherapy ( 50 Gy , 2 Gy daily 5 week ) postoperative chemotherapy four cycle NP regimen . Arm II : Patients undergo postoperative chemotherapy four cycle NP regimen . After completion study treatment , patient follow every 3 month 1 year , every 6 month 2 year , annually thereafter .
